trans-unit.source: Represents the exception that is thrown when an attempt is made to invoke an invalid target.
trans-unit.target: 表示当尝试调用无效目标时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: A `TargetException` is thrown when an attempt is made to invoke a non-static method on a null object.
trans-unit.target: A`TargetException`当尝试调用非静态方法对 null 对象时引发。

trans-unit.source: This may occur because the caller does not have access to the member, or because the target does not define the member, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 这可能是因为调用方没有访问成员，或者因为目标不会定义的成员，等等。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This exception is not included in the [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the , but it is thrown by some members that are.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此异常未包含在[.NET for Windows Store 应用](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912)或的详细信息，但它将引发的某些成员。

trans-unit.source: To catch the exception in that case, write a `catch` statement for <xref:System.Exception> instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要在这种情况下捕获异常，编写`catch`语句<xref:System.Exception>相反。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Reflection.TargetException"></xref> class with an empty message and the root cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Reflection.TargetException"></xref>使用空的消息和异常的根本原因的类。

trans-unit.source: The `InnerException` property is set to `null` and the HRESULT error code is set to COR_E_TARGET.
trans-unit.target: `InnerException`属性设置为`null`和 HRESULT 错误代码设置为 COR_E_TARGET。

trans-unit.source: `TargetException` inherits from the <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: `TargetException`继承自<xref:System.Exception>.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the properties of the `Exception` object as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数设置的属性`Exception`对象下表中所示。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The empty string ("").|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|空字符串 ("")。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Reflection.TargetException"></xref> class with the given message and the root cause exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Reflection.TargetException"></xref>使用给定的消息和根的类会导致异常。

trans-unit.source: `TargetException` inherits from the <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: `TargetException`继承自<xref:System.Exception>.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the properties of the `Exception` object as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数设置的属性`Exception`对象下表中所示。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> describing the reason why the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref>描述该异常发生的原因。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Reflection.TargetException"></xref> class with the specified serialization and context information.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Reflection.TargetException"></xref>使用指定的序列化和上下文信息的类。

trans-unit.source: The data for serializing or deserializing the object.
trans-unit.target: 用于序列化或反序列化对象数据。

trans-unit.source: The source of and destination for the object.
trans-unit.target: 源和目标对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Reflection.TargetException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Reflection.TargetException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 前一个异常的直接结果应包含中的前一个异常的引用引发的异常，<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性返回相同的值传递到构造函数中，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Reflection.TargetException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Reflection.TargetException>.</xref:System.Reflection.TargetException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|内部异常引用。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the `inner` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`inner`参数不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引发当前异常<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>处理内部异常的块。
